alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 09 at 10:52PM PST until December 10 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. I-90 through Snoqualmie Pass will be impacted by snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snoqualmie Pass snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Cle Elum and Easton should expect accumulations of 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Washington Cascades
